name: Superbike Xtreme
description:
Superbike Xtreme is a moto racing game inspired by the greatest arcade racer ever to hit the PC market - MotoRacer 1. Each curve and each lap in Superbike Xtreme re-creates the classic arcade feel and offers you limitless fun.
Full throttle all the way - braking is for the weak!

OLD SCHOOL COUCH MULTIPLAYER

Superbike Xtreme will feature Split Screen and Hot-Seat support in all game modes, to revive the nostalgia of playing with your best friends sitting on a couch all night long.

DYNAMIC OPPONENT DIFFICULTY

Dynamic opponent difficulty enables you to enjoy the challenge from day one without feeling overpowered or an underdog all the time.

SOLO-DEVELOPER

The game is being developed by a single person, Pavao Ivancek, with over 13 years of game development experience. This means you get a high quality product for a VERY low price.

IN DEVELOPMENT
  • First public version will be released on 1st April at a seriously reduced price (not an April's fools joke). 
  • Future updates will increase the price by $2. 
  • The first release will feature Single Race mode with 4 tracks in 2 different environments: The Desert & The Forest.
DEMO COMING SOON!

Prior to releasing the first paid version of the game, I will release a free demo sometime during March. Stay tuned!
